mapper.update: update tb_company set state = '审核通过' where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(distinct c.id) from tb_company c left join tb_service_relation sr on sr.company_id = c.id left join tb_service_type st on st.id = sr.service_type_id left join tb_service s on s.service_type_id = st.id left join (select C.id cid,GROUP_CONCAT(T.type_name separator'、') type_name from tb_company C left join tb_service_relation R on C.id=R.company_id left join tb_service_type T on R.service_type_id=T.id group by C.id) t on t.cid = c.id left join (select c.id,count(c.id) count_num from tb_order_info o left join tb_company c on c.id = o.company_id where company_order_state_id = 4 group by c.id) onum on onum.id = c.id
s.id = #{serviceId}

select c.*,r.region,onum.count_num from tb_company c left join tb_region r on r.id = c.region_id left join (select c.id,count(c.id) count_num from tb_order_info o left join tb_company c on c.id = o.company_id where company_order_state_id = 4 group by c.id) onum on onum.id = c.id where c.id = #{companyId}
